definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">entity_ticks</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @e[type=minecraft:item] if data entity @s {Item:{id:"changed_addon:transfur_totem"},Age:1s} run data modify entity @s Glowing set value 1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @e[type=minecraft:item] if data entity @s {Item:{id:"changed_addon:transfur_totem"},Age:1s} run data modify entity @s Lifespan set value 10000</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
